byline.contributor: Artin Afkhami contributed reporting from Boston, Maïa de la Baume from Paris, and Ravi Somaiya from London.

abstract: Iran injects new argument into its rebuttal of American allegations that its operatives plotted to assassinate Saudi ambassador to Washington.
snippet: Iran injected a new argument into its rebuttal of American allegations that its operatives plotted to assassinate the Saudi ambassador to Washington.
lead_paragraph: Iran injected a new argument into its rebuttal of American allegations that its operatives plotted to assassinate the Saudi ambassador to Washington.

headline.main: Iran Says Saudi Plot Defendant Belongs to Exile Group
headline.print_headline: Iran Says Plot to Kill Saudi Involved Opposition Group
headline.seo: Iran Says Saudi Plot Defendant Belongs to Exile Group
